Package chess15.algorithm

Class ChessAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
chess15.algorithm.ChessAlgorithm
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlgorithmInterface
public class ChessAlgorithm extends Object implements AlgorithmInterface
ChessAlgorithm is the class that contains the algorithm for playing the game.

    • ChessAlgorithm

      public ChessAlgorithm(RuleSet rules, Piece.Color player)
      Constructor for the ChessAlgorithm class.
      Parameters:
      rules - The RuleSet of the game.
      player - The Piece.Color of the side the computer plays.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public Move move(Board positions, Move playerMove)
      Calculate the best possible move from the current board setup and the opponents last move.
      Specified by:
      move in interface AlgorithmInterface
      Parameters:
      positions - The current Board positions.
      playerMove - The Move the user made.
      Returns:
      The best Move for the computer's pieces.

    • minmax

      private int minmax(int depth, int plyFromRoot, Engine engine, int alpha, int beta) throws InterruptedException
      The negamax algorithm used to calculate the best move.
      Parameters:
      depth - The current depth of the search. Starts from the desired number and ends on 0.
      plyFromRoot - Number of moves made from the inital Board positions in the current search depth.
      engine - The Engine used to calculate legal moves.
      alpha - The alpha value for alpha-beta pruning.
      beta - The beta value for alpha-beta pruning.
      Returns:
      The score of the best move in the current depth level.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • searchCaptures

      private int searchCaptures(Engine engine, int alpha, int beta) throws InterruptedException
      Searches for a quiet position (i.e. no captures avaliable on the next move) to evaluate.
      Parameters:
      engine - The Engine used to calculate legal moves.
      alpha - The alpha value for alpha-beta pruning.
      beta - The beta value for alpha-beta pruning.
      Returns:
      The score of the best possible move, or when a quiet position is reached the evaluation of that position.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • isWinScore

      public static boolean isWinScore(int score)
      Returns if the score is for a move that leads to a forced mate.
      Parameters:
      score - The score to check.
      Returns:
      True if the score is for a move that leads to a forced mate..

    • orderMoves

      private ArrayList<Move> orderMoves(Engine engine, Move storedMove)
      Order the moves based on the estimated score of the moves.
      Parameters:
      engine - The Engine used to calculate legal moves.
      Returns:
      The ordered list of moves.

    • scoreMove

      private int scoreMove(Vector2 start, Vector2 end, Board board)
      Score a move based on estimates.
      Parameters:
      start - The start Vector2 position of the move.
      end - The end Vector2 position of the move.
      board - The Board the move is made on.
      Returns:
      The estimated score of the move.
